CmdLine: conda install --yes     -c conda-forge     python-blosc     cytoolz     dask==2.9.1     lz4     nomkl     numpy==1.17.3     pandas==0.25.2     tini==0.18.0     && conda clean -tipsy     && find /opt/conda/ -type f,l -name '*.a' -delete     && find /opt/conda/ -type f,l -name '*.pyc' -delete     && find /opt/conda/ -type f,l -name '*.js.map' -delete     && find /opt/conda/lib/python*/site-packages/bokeh/server/static -type f,l -name '*.js' -not -name '*.min.js' -delete     && rm -rf /opt/conda/pkgs
